div.p:
Types of security policies that further specify the ActClassPolicy value set. Examples:
encrypt prohibit redisclosure without consent directive (OID = 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20444)
This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActCode where concept is-a SecurityPolicy

description.value: Types of security policies that further specify the ActClassPolicy value set. Examples: encrypt prohibit redisclosure without consent directive (OID = 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20444)
